host_venue.name: World Equestrian Center - Ocala
host_venue.venue_snap: Large curand masterpiece with white marble arenas, glassfronted hotel, and clean lines.
host_venue.venue_paragraph: World Equestrian Center Ocala is a 378-acre complex blending outdoor and indoor athletics in a luxurious setting. Bright stables and grand materials create an architectural scale with thoughtful detail that captures both performance and participant ease.
host_venue.venue_hello: Prestigious grounds where horseships and hospitality meet.
